sections.title: Help & Support
sections.description: Find answers to your questions and get help from our support team.

appointments_create.question: How do I create a new appointment for a client?
appointments_create.answer: Go to the "Calendar" or "Appointments" section and click "New appointment". Choose the client, service, staff member and time. The system will check availability and suggest suitable time slots.

appointments_modify.question: How can I change or cancel an existing appointment?
appointments_modify.answer: Open the appointment in the calendar or list and click "Edit". You can change the time, staff or service. To cancel, use the "Cancel appointment" button and specify the reason.

clients_add.question: How do I add a new client to the database?
clients_add.answer: Open the "Clients" section and click "Add client". Fill in the required fields (first name, last name, phone). You can also add email, birthday and notes.

clients_history.question: Where can I find a client's visit history?
clients_history.answer: Open the client card and navigate to the "History" tab. You'll see all past and upcoming appointments, plus total visits and spend.

services_create.question: How do I create a new service?
services_create.answer: In the "Services" section click "Add service". Provide name, duration, price and description. Assign it to specific staff or make available to all.

services_price.question: How do I change the price of a service?
services_price.answer: Open the service card, click "Edit" and update the price. Existing appointments keep the price they had when booked.

staff_add.question: How do I add a new staff member?
staff_add.answer: Go to the "Team" section and click "Add team member". Enter their details, set their schedule and assign services they can perform.

staff_schedule.question: How do I configure a staff member's schedule?
staff_schedule.answer: Within the staff profile open the "Schedule" tab. Set working days, start/end times, breaks and days off.

payments_accept.question: How can I record a payment from a client?
payments_accept.answer: Inside the appointment click "Pay". Choose the payment method (cash, card, online). After confirmation the status and receipt are updated automatically.

payments_reports.question: Where can I find financial reports?
payments_reports.answer: The "Analytics" section provides detailed revenue analytics, popular services and staff workload. You can export to Excel or PDF.

system_notifications.question: How do I configure notifications?
system_notifications.answer: Navigate to "Settings" → "Notifications". Set automatic reminders for clients via SMS/email and enable staff notifications.

system_password.question: I forgot my password, how do I restore access?
system_password.answer: On the login page click "Forgot password?" and enter your email. You'll receive a reset link. Check your spam folder if nothing arrives.
